<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="1589ae49cce"/>
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skinP.TitleBarSkin" width="750"  height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="158703fc977"/>
	<e:Group id="bg_title" width="100%" height="100%">
		<e:Rect fillColor="0x7A5236" top="0" bottom="4" left="0" right="0" />
		<e:Image source="TopBGLine_png" bottom="0" height="4" width="100%" />
	</e:Group>
	<e:Button id="btn_back" label="" verticalCenter="0"  left="12">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ButBack_png" alpha.down="0.6"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="iv_title" text="V01" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" size="36" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0xF5EECF" left="106" lineSpacing="8"/>
	<e:Button id="ic_user" label="" verticalCenter="0" right="16" width="72" height="71">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ButHead_png" alpha.down="0.6"/>		
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label id="tryTap" text="试玩"  touchEnabled="false" right="16" top="15" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="72" height="71" bold="true" size="30" alpha="0.6" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label id="tv_name" text="赌神" y="19" textAlign="right" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xfdf2d5" right="102" size="26"/>
	<e:Label id="tv_amount" text="$884,354,455" y="53" textAlign="right" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0xfcaf01" size="26" right="102"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TabButton2Skin" minHeight="50" minWidth="77" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="TabABG_png" source.upAndSelected="TabABGActivity_png" source.downAndSelected="TabABGActivity_png" left="6" left.upAndSelected="0" left.downAndSelected="0" right="0" height="100%" alpha="1" alpha.down="0.8" alpha.downAndSelected="0.8" scale9Grid="15,8,49,15"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" right="19" width="20" text="333" textColor="0xF6D08C" textColor.upAndSelected="0xFFFFFF" size="26" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="Tahoma" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skin.ISelectButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="158a89789bc"/>
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5" source="PageBG3_png" scale9Grid="10,15,14,15"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" left="10" right="50" size="26" textColor="0x30110A" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" height="100%"/>
    <e:Image source="PageButTap_png" source.down="PageButTapActivity_png" right="10" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skin.YellowButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15899a72078"/>
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="ButOK_png" source.down="ButOKActivity_png" scale9Grid="9,20,8,28" alpha.disabled="0.7" />
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textColor="0xeee6cd" size="33" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-3"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skin.PurpleButton2Skin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="158a8b84743"/>
    <e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" fillColor="0x221820" />
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textColor="0xF8E3AD" size="26" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skin.ActivityRecordSkin" minWidth="750" minHeight="750" currentState="{data.state}" states="Horizontal,Vertical"  xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ivi="ivi.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="159721a30e2"/>
    <e:Rect id="rectBG" height="100%" width="100%" fillColor.Vertical="0x221820" fillColor.Horizontal="0x000000" alpha.Horizontal="0.7" alpha.Vertical="1" touchEnabled="false" />
    <ivi:TitleBar id="titleBar" left="0" right="0" skinName="skinP.TitleBarSkin" includeIn="Vertical" visible.Horizontal="false" visible.Vertical="true"/>

    <e:Group id="mainGroup" width="1000" height="600"  width.Vertical="100%" height.Vertical="100%"  horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter.Horizontal="29">
        <e:Image width="100%" height="100%"  source="PageBG_png" scale9Grid="20,18,22,22" includeIn="Horizontal" visible.Horizontal="true" visible.Vertical="false" />
        <e:Image source="PageLightL_png" left="8" top="8" includeIn="Horizontal" visible.Horizontal="true" visible.Vertical="false"/>
	    <e:Image source="PageLightR_png" right="8" top="8" includeIn="Horizontal" visible.Horizontal="true" visible.Vertical="false"/>

        <e:Group width="100%" includeIn="Horizontal" visible.Horizontal="true" visible.Vertical="false">
            <e:Button name="butExit" right="8" top="12" width="70" height="70">
		        <e:skinName>
			    <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			        <e:Image width="33" height="33" source="ButClose_png" alpha.down="0.7" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
                    <e:Label width="100%" height="100%" />
			    </e:Skin>
		        </e:skinName>
	        </e:Button>
        </e:Group>

        <e:Button id="butRules" name="butRules" top="33" right="115" right.Vertical="60" top.Vertical="34">
            <e:skinName>
            <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
                <e:Image left="0" top="0" source="RulesIcon_png" alpha.down="0.7"/>
                <e:Label text="活动详情" size="26" left="32" top="4" alpha.down="0.7" />
            </e:Skin>
		    </e:skinName>
        </e:Button>

        <e:Group width="73" height="560" left="-65" top="20" top.Vertical="97" width.Vertical="100%" height.Vertical="68" left.Vertical="0" visible="true">
            <e:layout> <e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="right" verticalAlign="justify" horizontalAlign.Horizontal="justify" gap="3"/> </e:layout>
            <e:layout.Vertical><e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" horizontalAlign="justify" paddingLeft="0" paddingRight="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="0"/></e:layout.Vertical>
            <e:RadioButton id="topTab1" label="我的连赢" skinName="skins.TabButton2Skin" skinName.Vertical="skins.TabButton1Skin" height="100%"/>
            <e:RadioButton id="topTab2" label="连赢奖金排行" skinName="skins.TabButton2Skin" skinName.Vertical="skins.TabButton1Skin" height="100%"/>
            <e:RadioButton id="topTab3" label="连赢局数排行" skinName="skins.TabButton2Skin" skinName.Vertical="skins.TabButton1Skin" height="100%"/>
        </e:Group>

        <ivi:RecordSheet id="rSheet" left="10" right="10" left.Vertical="0" right.Vertical="0" Fixed="true" WildR="1" WildC="0" Styles="0:{0:{color:0xFBF2DC,size:22,align:'center',vertical:'middle'}}, 1:{0:{size:21,color:0xF8E3AD,align:'center',vertical:'middle'}}" Items="{data.sheet}" ScrollPolicy="0" ScrollPolicy.Vertical="1" LineImages="HeaderLine_png,SingularLine_png,DualLine_png" BGImages="BrownBox_png,SingularBG_png,DualBG_png" BGScale9Grids="5,6,12,38|5,2,4,4|5,2,4,4"/>
        
        <e:Label id="tapTitle"  text="连赢奖金龙虎榜（前10名）" size="28" textColor="0xF6D08C" height="80" height.Vertical="70" top="10" left="35" right="250" top.Vertical="165" left.Vertical="0" right.Vertical="0"  verticalAlign="middle" textAlign.Vertical="center"/>

        <e:Group id="tapBar" height="80" top="10" left="15" right="250" top.Vertical="165" left.Vertical="0" right.Vertical="0" right.Horizontal="270">
            <e:layout> <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" horizontalAlign="justify" paddingLeft="5" paddingRight="5"/></e:layout>
            <e:Group id="titleBarTSYJ" visible="false" includeInLayout="false">
                <e:Image source="PageTitleIcon3_png" left="0"  verticalCenter="0"/>
                <e:Label text="天生赢家   " left="45" height="38" size="30"  textColor="0xFBE39F" verticalCenter="0" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"/>
            </e:Group>
            <e:Label size="28" textColor="0xFBE39F" text="{data.label1}" textAlign="right"/>
            <e:Button name="butTime" label="{data.value1}" width="180" height="50" skinName="skin.ISelectButtonSkin"/>
            <e:Label  id="typeLabel" text="{data.label2}" size="28" textAlign="right" textColor="0xFBE39F"/>
            <e:Button id="butType" name="butType" label="{data.value2}" width="180" height="50" skinName="skin.ISelectButtonSkin"/>
            <e:Label text="   " size="28" />
            <e:Button name="butQuery" label="查询" width="130" height="50" skinName="skin.YellowButtonSkin"/>
        </e:Group>

        <e:DataGroup visible="false">
            <e:ArrayCollection><e:Array>
	                <e:Object id="data" label1="时间" label2="派彩" value1="1天内" value2="所有" state="Horizontal" />
	        </e:Array></e:ArrayCollection>
        </e:DataGroup>

        <e:Group id="infoBar1" bottom="68" left="10" right="10" height="50" height.Vertical="60" left.Vertical="0" right.Vertical="0" visible.Vertical="false">
            <e:Rect fillColor="0x4B4746" width="100%" height="100%" />
            <e:Group width="100%" height="100%" >
            <e:Button label="派彩小计" width="25%" width.Vertical="25%" height="48" height.Vertical="58" skinName="skin.PurpleButton2Skin" />
            <e:Button label="{data.subtotal}" width="20%" width.Vertical="25%" height="48" height.Vertical="58" skinName="skin.PurpleButton2Skin" />

            <e:Button label="派彩总计" width="25.82%" width.Vertical="25%" height="48" height.Vertical="58" skinName="skin.PurpleButton2Skin" />
            <e:Button label="{data.total}" width="29.29%" width.Vertical="25%" height="48" height.Vertical="58" skinName="skin.PurpleButton2Skin" />
			<e:layout><e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="1" verticalAlign="middle" paddingLeft="0" paddingTop="0" paddingBottom="0"/></e:layout>
            </e:Group>
        </e:Group>

        <e:Group id="infoBar2" bottom="68" left="10" right="10" height="40" height.Vertical="60" left.Vertical="0" right.Vertical="0" visible="false">
            <e:Rect fillColor="0x292526" fillColor.Vertical="0x302C2B" width="100%" height="100%" />
            <e:Label text="{'您的名次：' + data.ranking}" size="26" textColor="0xFBF2DC" bottom="1" left="25" height="100%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"/>
            <e:Label text="{'共 ' + data.headCount + ' 人上榜'}" size="26" textColor="0xFBF2DC" bottom="1"  right="25" left.Vertical="370" height="100%"  verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="right"/>
        </e:Group>

        <e:Group id="pageBar" bottom="10" left="0" right="0" height="60" bottom.Vertical="5">
            <e:layout><e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle" horizontalAlign="center" gap="30"/></e:layout>
            <e:Button name="butBack" width="125">
			    <e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				    <e:Image right="10" height="100%" scale9Grid="0,0,28,49" source="ButPage_png" source.down="ButPageActivity_png"/>
				    <e:Label width="100%" height="100%" id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			    </e:skinName>
		    </e:Button>
            <e:Label text="{data.current + ' / ' + data.totalPaging}" size="32" textColor="0xD8C9A3" />
            <e:Button name="butNext" rotation="180" width="125">
			    <e:skinName>
				    <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				    <e:Image right="10" height="100%" scale9Grid="0,0,28,49" source="ButPage_png" source.down="ButPageActivity_png"/>
				    <e:Label width="100%" height="100%" id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				    </e:Skin>
			    </e:skinName>
		    </e:Button>
        </e:Group>

        <e:Image id="goldMedal" source="GoldMedal_png" visible="false" />
        <e:Image id="silverMedal" source="SilverMedal_png" visible="false" />
        <e:Image id="bronzeMedal" source="BronzeMedal_png" visible="false" />
        
        <e:Group id="infoBar3" left="10" right="10" left.Vertical="0" right.Vertical="0" top="10" bottom="8" touchChildren="false" top.Horizontal="83" top.Vertical="164">
            <e:Image source="ActivityCup01_png"  horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
            <e:Label id="labelPrompt1" text="尚未有用户上榜" size="20" textColor="0xFBF2DC" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="70"/>
            <e:Label id="labelPrompt2" text="抓住机会，大奖就属于您！" size="20" textColor="0xFBF2DC" verticalCenter="102" horizontalCenter="0"/>
        </e:Group>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skin.BacBetSkin" width="750" height="425" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ivi="ivi.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15832800c8c"/>
	<e:Image touchEnabled="false" source="bg_tz_cbac_n_png" bottom="0" left="0"/>
	<e:Image touchEnabled="false" scaleX="-1" source="bg_tz_cbac_n_png" bottom="0" right="0"/>
	<ivi:ImageButton id="pb_11"  width="195" height="267" sources="down:ic_tz_b_p_png,selected:ic_tz_b_png" scale9Grid="33,33,2,2" left="0" bottom="0"/>
	<ivi:ImageButton id="pb_10"  width="193.67" height="267" sources="down:ic_tz_b_p_png,selected:ic_tz_b_png" scale9Grid="33,33,2,2" scaleX="-1" anchorOffsetX="0" right="0" bottom="0"/>
	<ivi:ImageButton id="pb_13"  width="184.33" height="129" sources="down:ic_tz_rect_p_png,selected:ic_tz_rect_b_png" scale9Grid="33,33,2,2" anchorOffsetX="0" horizontalCenter="91" bottom="0"/>
	<ivi:ImageButton id="pb_14"  width="184" height="129" sources="down:ic_tz_rect_p_png,selected:ic_tz_rect_b_png" scale9Grid="33,33,2,2" horizontalCenter="-91" bottom="0"/>
	<ivi:ImageButton id="pb_12"  width="184.33" height="141" sources="down:ic_tz_rect_p_png,selected:ic_tz_rect_b_png" scale9Grid="33,33,2,2" scaleY="-1" bottom="126" horizontalCenter="91"/>
	<ivi:ImageButton id="pb_30" width="184.33" height="141" sources="down:ic_tz_rect_p_png,selected:ic_tz_rect_b_png,disabled:ic_tz_rect_b_un_png" scale9Grid="33,33,2,2" scaleY="-1" bottom="126" horizontalCenter="-91"/>
	<e:Group touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="false" cacheAsBitmap="true" bottom="8" horizontalCenter="0.5">
		<e:Image source="ic_tip_player_png" x="5" y="21" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image source="ic_tip_tile_png" touchEnabled="false" x="370" y="0"/>
		<e:Image touchEnabled="false" x="162" y="5" source="ic_tip_stile_p_png"/>
		<e:Image id="ic_banker" source="ic_tip_banker_png" y="21" touchEnabled="false" x="557"/>
		<e:Image source="ic_tip_player_2_png" x="183" touchEnabled="false" y="129"/>
		<e:Image source="ic_tip_banker_2_png" x="362" touchEnabled="false" y="129"/>
		<e:Image source="ic_ms_s_png" x="0" y="195" touchEnabled="false" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
